metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7264 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the fz_subsample_pixmap function infitz/pixmap.c in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted document.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
